January 2025 - Present (10 months)
Covilhã, Castelo Branco, Portugal
I am an AI engineering student building **end-to-end AI systems** with a focus
on **LLMs, RAG, autonomous agents, and scalable AI applications**.  
Key highlights include:  
- **dolphin-doc-extractor** – Intelligent document parser using OpenAI GPT-4
+ Tesseract OCR.  
- **deploy-agentic-rag** – Multi-agent RAG system with CrewAI & LitServe
deployment.  
- **askmydocs** – Document QA system powered by LlamaIndex and OpenAI
embeddings.  
- **First-Real-Agent** – Prototype autonomous agent built with LangChain &
LiteLLM.  
- **mini-sql-analyst** – Conversational NLP-to-SQL data querying agent.  
Tech Stack: **LangChain, LlamaIndex, CrewAI, LiteLLM, OpenAI APIs,
FastAPI, Streamlit, Docker, vector databases**  
I am actively seeking **full-time AI Engineer roles in 2025**, aiming to deliver
production-ready AI solutions that combine cutting-edge research with
practical deployment.
